[[File:CI du THM.jpg|vignette|CI du THM]]
'''Certain situations require the choice of the non-oral route of administration.'''

These are essentially certain metabolic conditions such as hypertriglyceridaemia or hypertension, or in women with venous thrombo-embolic risk factors.

properties.question: In which of the following situations is the non-oral route of administration for Hormone Replacement Therapy (HRT) considered necessary?
properties.option_a: For patients with a preference for oral medication
properties.option_b: For individuals with hypertriglyceridaemia or hypertension
properties.option_c: For patients who have difficulty swallowing pills
properties.option_d: For women without any risk factors for venous thrombo-embolism
